@createClaim.description: Button label for creating a new claim

@submitted.description: Status label for a submitted claim

@inReview.description: Status label for a claim being reviewed

@actionRequired.description: Status label for a claim requiring action from the user

@processing.description: Status label for a claim being processed

@approved.description: Status label for an approved claim

@rejected.description: Status label for a rejected claim

@paid.description: Status label for a paid claim
